title: twig is constant test
description: The is constant function allows you to check if a value is exactly the same as a class constant.

title: twig is defined test
description: The is defined test allows you to check if a variable is defined.

title: twig is empty test
description: The is empty test allows you to check if a variable is empty.

title: twig is even test
description: The is even test allows you to check if a variable is even.

title: twig is iterable test
description: The is iterable test allows you to check if a variable is iterable.

title: twig is null test
description: The is null test allows you to check if a variable is null.

title: twig is divisible by test
description: The is divisible by test allows you to check if a variable is divisible by a number.

title: twig is same as test
description: The is same as test allows you to check if a variable is the same as another variable.
